sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Star, StarFill, Trash3Fill, Eyeglasses } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import axios from 'axios'; import { NotesModal } from './Modal'; export const Job = ({job, deleteHandler}) => { const [starred,setStarred] = useState(job.starred); const [modal, seeModal] = useState(false); const starredHandler = () => { axios.put(`http://localhost:8000/api/jobs/${job._id}`, {starred: !starred}) .then(res => setStarred(res.data.job.starred)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const selectHandler = (e,id) => { axios.put(`http://localhost:8000/api/jobs/${id}`, {status: e.target.value}) .then(res => console.log(res.data.job)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return ( <> {job.position} {job.company} Link seeModal(true)} style={{cursor:'pointer'}}> {starred ? : } deleteHandler(job._id)} style={{cursor:'pointer'}}> seeModal(false)} job={job} /> ) }
